translated: The pronunciation of Latin has changed a lot during its long history, but the one that interests us is that of spoken Latin and wrote at the time of Julius Caesar and Cicero in the first century BC
original: La prononciation du latin a beaucoup changé au cours de sa longue histoire, mais celle qui nous intéresse est celle du latin parlé et écrit à l'époque de Jules César et de Cicéron, au cours du Ier siècle avant J.
